DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate whether McGrath® MAC video laryngoscope equal superior compare Glidescope® Ranger Macintosh laryngoscope novice user simulate airway manikin .
DOC.detailed_description: Investigators compare two portable video laryngoscope ( GlidesScope® Ranger ( Verathon Inc , Bothell , WA , USA ) McGrath® MAC ( Aircraft Medical Ltd , Edinburgh , UK ) ) German type Macintosh metal blade fiberoptic light . A blade size 4 used device . All intubation use video laryngoscope perform accord manufacturer ' instruction . A specialised rigid stylet ( GlideRite® ) use Glidescope® flexible plastic stylet bent hockey stick curvature , use McGrath® MAC Macintosh laryngoscope . A size 7.5 endotracheal tube ( Mallinckrodt™ Hi-Lo Oral/Nasal Tracheal Tube Cuffed Murphy Eye , Covidien , Ireland ) use laryngoscope . All participant randomly divide 3 device group . Each group allow attempt perform endotracheal intubation five time use Laerdal® Airway Management Trainer ( Laerdal Medical Korea Ltd. , Seoul , Korea ) normal airway set . After complete normal airway session , participant perform another five attempt neck immobilisation set use neck collar . The sequence three device use randomly assign , participant perform sequence interval five week study .
DOC.criteria: Medical student without previous experience intubation Heart , wrist , low back disease pregnant exclude
